messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to unfortunate events, the AI is being shut down temporarily due to some faulty wiring. Please resume your shift.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bridge.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a pack of wire eating mammals have descended into the maintenance tunnels.
